title: Pandemic
notes: As a cooperative game, a simple sheet to record victory/defeat status, number of outbreaks, and eradicated diseases for up to 4 players.

title: Patchwork
notes: A 2-player game. A sheet to record factors like empty spaces (negative points) and button count (positive points) to calculate the final score.

title: Wind the Film
notes: A solo/co-op game. Score is based on photo quality, film usage, and other objectives for up to 4 players.

title: Splendor
notes: A simple sheet to record each player's prestige points (victory points) for up to 4 players.

title: Geister
notes: A 2-player abstract game. A simple sheet to record the win/loss count for each player across multiple matches.
